Key Arguments: The legislation threatens Australia's democratic society and could lead to a dictatorship.
It infringes on freedom of speech and human rights.
The legislation is an insult to the Australian people's ability to discern truth from falsehood.
Australian Federal Senators should vote against the bill.
Notable Quotes: I am writing to absolutely appose the prosect of such a bill or legislation being introduced in Australia;
We have enjoyed, as have our ancestors who fought for such, a free democratic society and such a law will stop our liberty to have freedom of speech and a breech of our ‘God’ given human rights.
To even suggest such legislation is an insult to the Australian people’s integrity to decide or discern for themselves what is fact or fiction, truth or untruth.
